name: Loom Regetable Desisions
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD/arrow keys to move
  • E to interact with doors and objects.
  • A Red ! mark will show above the players head when you are next to an interactable object.

This was a quick little game I made. Was meant to be a personal game jam but I got busy with other things. Finally had some time to finish this up. This is a very short game please enjoy.

Game should only be around ~15 minutes long for a first time playthrough.

First game here goes nothing lol.
